description: This file defines the GameProvider class, which serves as a Flutter ChangeNotifier to manage game state, handle game logic interactions, and expose actions like new game, undo, and directional moves for a 2048 game implementation. It encapsulates state management, move handling, and synchronization with the game logic, facilitating integration with Flutter UI components.

classes.name: GameProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages the game state for a Flutter 2048 game, including current board, score, history for undo, and move operations.

methods.name: GameProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing the game with optional seed for reproducibility.

methods.name: newGame
methods.description: Starts a new game, optionally seeding the RNG, and resets game state and history.

methods.name: undo
methods.description: Reverts the last move if available.

methods.name: moveLeft
methods.description: Performs a left move, updating game state accordingly.

methods.name: moveRight
methods.description: Performs a right move, updating game state accordingly.

methods.name: moveUp
methods.description: Performs an upward move, updating game state accordingly.

methods.name: moveDown
methods.description: Performs a downward move, updating game state accordingly.
